Texts.Eng: Here you go, your fully restored Legion blade! Make good use of it, Droden.

Now that we have the Legion Switch Gear, all we need are some raw materials to repair the blade itself. If you can ^green;find me ^orange;10 Superb Kavanite Plates ^green;and a piece of ^orange;Avikan Circuitry^white;, I can finish the repairs.
